name: GENESIS (itch) (blizstudio)
description:
The Game:

Guide your galaxy through the universe and gather life essence to complete the galaxy and create life.  What form of life you create depends on luck, skill, and time.  There are 10 possible results.  Which form of life will you create?

Gameplay:

As the Galaxy rotates, collect the same colored live essence particles with the same colored galaxy arm.  Once the galaxy is complete you will see how well you have created a lifeform.  The better you do the higher the lifeform.  Avoid the black holes and 

List all third party assets used.
1. (2) Music tracks from: https://www.silvermansound.com/free-music
-  "The Rise of Heros"
-  "Against Time"

2. iTween free for camera shake from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/tween-55983

Number of Team Members: 2
- Jerry Berg - Art, Design,  and Sound/Voice
- John Wolz - Development
